item.name: Export authority moving restrictions as GeoJSON by ID.

request.name: Export authority moving restrictions as GeoJSON by ID.

description.content: Returns a GeoJSON containing the moving restrictions of an authority.

query.description: The set of moving restriction IDs. If left empty all allowed restrictions will be exported.

item.name: Export authority static restrictions as GeoJSON by ID.

request.name: Export authority static restrictions as GeoJSON by ID.

description.content: Returns a GeoJSON containing the restrictions of an authority.

query.description: The set of static restriction IDs. If left empty all allowed restrictions will be exported.

item.name: Export authority static restrictions as DXF by slug.

request.name: Export authority static restrictions as DXF by slug.

description.content: Returns a DXF containing the restrictions of an authority.

query.description: The set of static restriction IDs. If left empty will export all allowed restrictions will be exported.

item.name: Export authority static restrictions as GeoJSON by slug.

request.name: Export authority static restrictions as GeoJSON by slug.

description.content: Returns a GeoJSON containing the moving restrictions of an authority.

query.description: The set of static restriction IDs. If left empty all allowed restrictions will be exported.

item.name: Fetch basic authority information for all authorities that you are entitled to access.

request.name: Fetch basic authority information for all authorities that you are entitled to access.

description.content: Fetch basic authority information for all authorities that you are entitled to access.

response.name: OK

item.name: Fetch the basic authority information by slug.

request.name: Fetch the basic authority information by slug.

description.content: Returns the the basic authority information by slug (authority name).

response.name: OK

item.name: Fetch full authority restrictions information by slug.

request.name: Fetch full authority restrictions information by slug.

description.content:
Returns an object which has the location of the documents containing the full restrictions of an authority 
 
The documentation provided here shows the model you will find at these locations. The initial object contains only the URLs. 

You will have to fetch the documents from the returned authority URLs.
Returns Status (pong) of the API service

item.name: Executes a Web Feature Service (WFS) query.

request.name: Executes a Web Feature Service (WFS) query.

description.content: Executes a Web Feature Service (WFS) query.
The slug used to identify the authority eg. e.g. hackney.
